item.title: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Multiple Filerz maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 2, 21:00 UTC  -  Oct 3, 04:00 UTC

Sep 26, 22:28 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Sep 26, 15:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our responsibilities for Web Hosting filerz, we will be performing infrastructure maintenance.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 02/10/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 03/10/2025 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned Filerz will be temporarily unavailable for 40 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing an update for the storage servers hosting your data.
This version brings improvements to certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.

List of concerned Filerz:

- filerz481: Cluster102
- filerz580: Cluster04
- filerz638: Cluster10
- filerz158: Cluster26

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA7][Web Hosting] - Cluster105/filerz315 Incident Notification
item.description:
Sep 30, 03:36 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting offer in the specific Cluster 105/filerz315 has been resolved.

Start time : 30/09/2025 01:59 UTC
End time : 30/09/2025 03:26 UTC
Root Cause : It was due to this maintenance https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com//incidents/z937x2gn91hz

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 30, 03:01 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our WebHosting offer on the specific Cluster105/filerz315

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 30/09/2025 01:59 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : File server 315 is unreachable on Web Hosting cluster 105.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot access their Hosting in this specific filerz.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 30, 02:55 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Web Hosting offer in the specific Cluster 105/filerz315.

Start time : 30/09/2025 01:59 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
